Description.Name: Raquel Martinez
Description.Details: Raquel Martines, known as "Bandit", is a 28-year-old MechWarrior whose skills on the battlefield are as captivating as they are deadly. With a heritage steeped in MechWarrior tradition, she emerges as a testament to the martial legacy of her family. The callsign "Bandit", comes from her combat style, often chosing to take the a more risky move to get her enemy right where she wants them.
